description:
Ford filed a patent to record your conversations and use those conversations to serve you ads directly on your car's screen - talk about creepy! In this video I cover the patent, safety concerns, privacy concerns, security concerns, offer analysis on the auto industry as a whole, and more!

Thank you to our sponsor Notesnook! Visit their site to learn more about keeping your data safe with E2EE notes: https://notesnook.com

title: Ford's Big Brother Patent: Ads from Your Conversations
